name: Charlie no name
description:
Journal entry - post-shoot party

The elusive Charlie will go uncredited in the film... the mystery remains. His words ring out.

"The delight of summers midnight fever. Don't you miss that? Don't tell me yet, I don't want to do. They have it, they fucking have it, that little magic trick to convince oneself that all now is everything. The beat of the heart, the beat of the feet, the beat of the mind..." 

100% of the money raised will go to finishing this truly independent film and paying the artists. Four years of blood, sweat and tears. A cult classic in the making.

AUS/NZ Distribution: Pivot Pictures, Filmink Presents

PR + Trailer: https://www.grass-fires.com/blog/milesawaytrailer

9/10

Photographer: Viktor Wallmark 
(Canon A-1)
